com.tumblr.backboard.performer

Class MapPerformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tumblr.backboard.performer.Performer
      • com.tumblr.backboard.performer.MapPerformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpringListener

    public class MapPerformer
extends Performer
    Maps the motion of a Spring to a Property on a View.

    Created by ericleong on 5/6/14.
